Package org.planit.output.formatter

Class BasicMemoryOutputFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.planit.output.formatter.BaseOutputFormatter
      • org.planit.output.formatter.BasicMemoryOutputFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OutputFormatter
    public class BasicMemoryOutputFormatter
extends BaseOutputFormatter
    Formatter which saves the results from assignment runs in memory
    Author:
    gman6028

    • Method Detail

      • saveRecord

        private void saveRecord​(long trafficAssignmentId,
                        long timePeriodId,
                        long modeId,
                        long startNodeId,
                        long endNodeId,
                        double flow,
                        double length,
                        double maximumSpeed,
                        double capacityPerLane,
                        int numberOfLanes,
                        double cost)
                 throws PlanItException
        Saves a cost value for a specified link, specified by several input parameters
        Parameters:
        trafficAssignmentId - the id of this traffic assignment run
        timePeriodId - the id of the specified time period
        modeId - the id of the specified mode
        startNodeId - the external Id of the start node of this link segment
        endNodeId - the external Id of the end node of this link segment
        flow - the flow through this link segment
        length - the length of this link segment
        maximumSpeed - the maximum speed parameter along this link segment
        capacityPerLane - the specified capacity per lane of this link segment
        numberOfLanes - the number of lanes of this link segment
        cost - the computed travel cost for this link segment
        Throws:
        PlanItException - thrown if there is an error

      • writeResultsForCurrentModeAndTimePeriod

        private void writeResultsForCurrentModeAndTimePeriod​(TraditionalStaticAssignmentLinkOutputAdapter outputAdapter,
                                                     Mode mode,
                                                     TimePeriod timePeriod,
                                                     double[] modalNetworkSegmentCosts,
                                                     double[] modalNetworkSegmentFlows,
                                                     TransportNetwork transportNetwork)
                                              throws PlanItException
        Save results for the current mode and time period
        Parameters:
        outputAdapter - TraditionalStaticAssignmentLinkOutputAdapter
        mode - current mode of travel
        timePeriod - current time period
        modalNetworkSegmentCosts - calculated segment costs for the physical network
        modalNetworkSegmentFlows - calculated flows for the network
        transportNetwork - the transport network
        Throws:
        PlanItException - thrown if there is an error

      • writeResultsForCurrentTimePeriod

        private void writeResultsForCurrentTimePeriod​(TraditionalStaticAssignmentLinkOutputAdapter outputAdapter,
                                              TraditionalStaticAssignmentSimulationData simulationData,
                                              Set<Mode> modes,
                                              TimePeriod timePeriod)
                                       throws PlanItException
        Save the results for the current time period
        Parameters:
        outputAdapter - TraditionalStaticAssignmentLinkOutputAdapter used to retrieve the results of the assignment
        simulationData - simulation data for the current iteration
        modes - Set of modes of travel
        timePeriod - the current time period
        Throws:
        PlanItException - thrown if there is an error

        Parameters:

      • getLinkSegmentOutput

        public Object getLinkSegmentOutput​(long trafficAssignmentId,
                                   long timePeriodId,
                                   long modeId,
                                   long startNodeId,
                                   long endNodeId,
                                   OutputProperty outputProperty)
                            throws PlanItException
        Retrieves a specified output for the current link segment
        Parameters:
        trafficAssignmentId - the id of this traffic assignment run
        timePeriodId - the id of the specified time period
        modeId - the id of the specified mode
        startNodeId - the external Id of the start node of this link segment
        endNodeId - the external Id of the end node of this link segment
        outputProperty - enumeration value used to specify which output is required
        Returns:
        the value of the specified output
        Throws:
        PlanItException - thrown if there is an error
